title: BBC Local Live: Northamptonshire for Wednesday, 13 April 2016 - BBC News
summary: councillors to decide on `` fighting fund '' against a new rail freight terminal .
more than one review into the future of local government in northamptonshire would be `` stupid '' , says county council 's deputy-leader .
royal mail apology after some police and crime commissioner campaign literature was delivered inside the government 's eu referendum leaflet .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 on thursday .

documents.title: our live coverage through the day
text: local live is finished for today but we 'll be back tomorrow with all the latest news , weather , sport and travel for northamptonshire .

documents.title: mobbs memorial match at northampton saints tonight
text: northampton saints forwards coach dorian west told me that it 's `` crucial '' that current players have an understanding of the club 's history and past players such as edgar mobbs ( holding the ball ) .
the mobbs memorial match takes places this evening at franklin 's gardens , with saints taking on the british army .

the match has been played since 1917 , in memory of saints and england captain mobbs , who was killed at the battle of passchendaele while commanding the 7th battalion of the northamptonshire regiment .
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: weather : showers tonight but fine tomorrow
text: lots of fine weather this evening but the risk of a few showers and isolated thunderstorms and lows of 4c ( 39f ) .
early mist clearing to sunny spells and highs of 17c ( 62f ) .
author: Alex Dolan
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: corby mp and grassroots out founder says they will not challenge decision over official leave campaign
text: leave.eu , a group backed by ukip donor arron banks , which supported grassroots out , said it was planning to seek a judicial review of the electoral commission 's decision to designate vote leave the official leave campaign in june 's eu referendum .
however , corby mp , conservative tom pursglove , who was one of the founders of grassroots out , which also lost out on official designation , says there will be no challenge from them
i for one , and @ twitterid do not support a legal challenge .
the sole aim is clear : winning on the 23rd june !
# leave
really pleased to hear this tom .
looking forward to working with you !
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid # voteleave

@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid i think they have every right to challenge the decision vl leaked the news last night b4 decision
@ twitterid @ twitterid well done tom !
magnanimous and move on .
( however , i do n't agree with you on the commission )

@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid well said tom .
thank you for your excellent speech at the bic last sat .

documents.title: headlines : grassroots out loses out on official designation decision due on rail freight fighting fund
text: if you are catching up
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: leave group backed by three county mp not named as a lead eu referendum campaign
text: vote leave and britain stronger in europe have been designated as the official leave and remain campaigns in june 's eu referendum .

vote leave - backed by boris johnson and michael gove - saw off a challenge from a rival campaign grassroots out , backed by ukip leader nigel farage ( middle ) and wellingborough mp peter bone ( right ) , corby mp tom pursglove ( left ) and kettering mp philip hollobone ( not
the campaigns will be allowed to spend up to £ 7m , get a free mailshot , tv broadcasts and £ 600,000 public funds .
the electoral commission made the decision .
author: BBC Politics

documents.title: weather : sunshine and showers this afternoon
text: there has been lots of sunshine across northamptonshire , as you can from this of irhlingborough by bbc weather watcher 'coleole ' .
scattered showers will develop this afternoon but there may be some sunshine which will make it feel quite pleasant with a high of 15c ( 59f ) .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: deadline for voter registration for may 's elections approaching
text: elections for a third of daventry district council seats and for northamptonshire 's police and crime commissioner take place on 5 may but you will only be able to vote if you have registered to do so - and the deadline is next monday .
if you are not already registered , you can do so by by clicking here .
and if you want to find out more about the elections you can visit the voter information site or the bbc news elections homepage .
author: BBC News England

documents.title: edgar mobbs hall of fame cap loan to the saints for memorial match
text: the world rugby hall of fame cap awarded to edgar mobbs will be loaned to northampton saints this evening ahead of their mobbs memorial match against the british army at franklin 's gardens .
mobbs became the first saints player in the hall of fame when he was inducted into it last september .
he made 234 appearances for the club , captained england and was killed in world war one , commanding the 7th battalion of the northamptonshire regiment .
author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: ex-firefighter criticises northants fire over use of initial response vehicles
text: a retired fire officer has criticised northamptonshire fire and rescue service 's response to road accidents .
author: Daventry Express

documents.title: press were right not to publish whittingdale stories , says corby mp
text: newspapers were right not to publish stories about culture secretary john whittingdale 's private life , according to corby 's conservative mp tom pursglove .
`` this is exactly the sort of story that all of us were saying , and the public were saying , should n't be appearing in newspapers , '' he said .
mr pursglove said the culture secretary probably had `` more experience than anyone else in government '' on press regulation , adding : `` i think we need that expertise . ''
author: BBC News Channel

documents.title: rail freight terminal 'very concerning ' says parish councillor
text: south northamptonshire council will decide tonight whether to put £ 100,000 into a fighting fund against a new rail freight terminal between milton malsor and blisworth .
the developers say it would create 9,000 jobs , but people who live nearby are worried about the impact it will have .
author: Martin Heath
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northampton community loses battle to save pub but might be offered a meeting room upstairs
text: a lengthy bid to save a northampton pub from being turned into a shop was finally defeated last night - though its soon-to-be tenants might offer residents a room upstairs to meet in .
author: Northampton Chronicle & Echo

documents.title: northants captain wakely 'frustrated ' by abandoned game
text: no play was possible on day four of the division two game between northamptonshire and sussex , which ended as a draw after heavy overnight rain .
the abandonment left northants opener ben duckett stranded on 282 not out , 49 short of the county 's record score .
but the county 's captain says there will be more opportunities for the opener
frustrating .
good start though .
gutted for @ twitterid not to have the chance to make history .
he will get another chance .
# steelbacks
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid when you going to triple cap : )
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid let 's hope it 's soon !
@ twitterid

documents.title: cinema plans for rushden lakes could be approved next week
text: a new 12-screen cinema could be given the go-ahead next week .
author: Northamptonshire Telegraph

documents.title: headlines : council could set up fund against rail freight terminal mobbs cap loaned to the saints
text: here are your lunchtime headlines :
author: Sarah Foster
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: football club wants protection for former ground
text: kettering town have nominated their former ground of rockingham road in the town as a `` asset of community value '' to kettering borough council .
an asset of community value is subject to additional protection from development .
a decision on the nomination is expected within eight weeks .
kettering left the ground in 2011 after financial issues and it remained empty since but the club hopes to return to the ground in the future .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: northamptonshire 's duckett 'gutted ' after rain means no chance of triple century
text: northamptonshire 's opening county championship match of the season at wantage road has been abandoned , due to overnight rain causing the outfield to be too wet for play .
it leaves 21-year-old opener ben duckett on 282 not out in the first innings against sussex and frustrated with a lack of play over the last two days .
words can not describe how gutted i am .
very frustrating two days .
just want to thank everyone for their amazing support

documents.title: deadline for buying tata uk steel business is end of may , says potential buyer
text: the deadline for bids for tata steel 's uk business , which includes the plant at corby , is the end of may , according to sanjeev gupta , executive chairman of liberty house , one of the companies that has previously spoken of its interest in taking on the business .
yesterday , business secretary sajid javid said the government was prepared to `` co-invest '' with potential buyers of tata 's remaining business .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live

documents.title: northampton young side to face army in mobbs memorial match
text: the saints face the army tonight in the mobbs memorial match and they have a very young side .
the stand-out selection is at fly-half where 17-year-old james grayson follows in the footsteps of his father , former saint and england fly-half paul grayson .

author: Graham McKechnie
BBC Radio Northampton sport

documents.title: royal mail apologises after eu and police and crime commissioner leaflet mix-up
text: royal mail has apologised after some police and crime commissioner campaign literature was delivered inside a government eu referendum leaflet .

ukip candidate sam watts says residents have told him campaign leaflets for the conservative stephen mold were delivered within a much-talked about government eu referendum leaflet which , he claims , could give the impression mr mold has government endorsement .
mr mold says he was not aware they would be delivered on the same day and royal mail says this should not have happened and that staff have been spoken to .
the other candidate in may 's election is labour 's kevin mckeever .
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton politics reporter

documents.title: council admits there are 'some issues ' with planters in town centre
text: planters on abington street in northampton , where some rather sorry-looking grass surrounds the trees , have been attracting some criticism .

northampton borough council told me : `` we have established that there are some issues with the irrigation of the four planters close to the library and we are working with the manufacturer to rectify this so that the planters can be filled . ''
we do you think of them ?
let us know on our facebook page .
author: Stuart Linnell
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: northamptonshire 's match abandoned in county championship
text: the match at wantage road between northamptonshire and sussex has been abandoned , with no play possible today , the fourth and final day , due to a rain-soaked outfield .
it means northamptonshire opener ben duckett will be left stranded on 282 not out .
update : play has been abandoned for the day therefore the game has ended .
9 points for northants and 6 for sussex .

author: Andrew Radd

documents.title: county council says their could be more than one unitary authorities but only one study
text: northamptonshire county council 's deputy leader heather smith has said that councils should wait for an independent review into the county 's local government make-up and see whether they suggest one , two or even three unitary authorities .

previously , the county council had said there should be only one authority for the whole county but , although mr smith appears more receptive to the idea of more than one unitary authority , she said more than one review into county 's local government would be `` stupid '' .
the county 's borough and district councils had discussed holding a separate study to that of the county council .
author: Sam Read
BBC Radio Northampton politics reporter

documents.title: councillors could use public money to fight rail freight terminal
text: councillors in south northamptonshire will decide later whether to use £ 100,000 of public money to establish a fighting fund against a new rail freight terminal .
rail central proposals would see a rail depot the size of 100 football pitches built between the villages of milton malsor and blisworth .
plans for the new interchange were first revealed back in january although a planning application has n't yet been submitted .
author: Martin Heath
BBC Radio Northampton

documents.title: weather : sunny spells but showers later
text: it should be a dry morning with some sunny spells but a cloudier afternoon with scattered showers and a high of 15c ( 59f )
you can see my full forecast below

documents.title: good morning and welcome to local live for northamptonshire
text: between now and 18:00 i 'll be in the bbc newsroom in northampton bringing you the days news , the latest sport , up-to-date travel and detailed weather forecasts .
if you want to get in touch then please email me or tweet us .
author: Pete Cooper
BBC Local Live
